document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">How </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">fortunate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">Grave </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">All </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">Prizes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b04494">obtain, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffc04e">Successful </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">certain, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">if </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">last, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">First </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">Suitor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#88b0e0">vain. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: How fortunate the grave
